articles.title: Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner completes stunning Real Madrid comeback against Sevilla - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner sealed Real Madrid's stunning comeback as they recovered from 2-0 down to beat Sevilla 3-2.
articles.content:
Karim Benzema's last-gasp winner sealed Real Madrid's stunning comeback as they recovered from 2-0 down to beat Sevilla 3-2.
The striker's 39th goal of the season sent Madrid 15 points clear at the … [+2810 chars]
